alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 26 at 9:51PM EDT until September 27 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, up to one foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. For the Coastal Flood Watch, up to two feet of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Dorchester, Wicomico and Somerset Counties. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 5 AM EDT Wednesday. For the Coastal Flood Watch, from Wednesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. CAMBRIDGE MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.5 FT, MODERATE 4.0 FT, MAJOR 4.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.0 FT, MAJOR 2.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 26/03 PM 2.5 0.5 0.6 1 NONE 27/03 AM 3.3 1.3 1.0 1 NONE 27/03 PM 3.7 1.7 1.6 1 MINOR 28/03 AM 3.8 1.8 1.6 1 MINOR 28/04 PM 3.6 1.6 1.4 1 MINOR 29/04 AM 3.6 1.6 1.3 1 MINOR BISHOPS HEAD MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.2 FT, MODERATE 3.7 FT, MAJOR 4.2 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.1 FT, MODERATE 1.6 FT, MAJOR 2.1 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 27/12 AM 3.4 1.3 0.9 2 MINOR 27/12 PM 3.9 1.8 1.5 2 MODERATE 28/01 AM 4.1 2.0 1.5 2 MODERATE 28/01 PM 3.9 1.8 1.4 2 MODERATE 29/02 AM 3.8 1.7 1.2 2 MODERATE CRISFIELD MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.5 FT, MODERATE 4.0 FT, MAJOR 5.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.3 FT, MODERATE 1.8 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 26/11 PM 3.6 1.4 1.3 1 MINOR 27/11 AM 3.6 1.4 1.8 1 MINOR 28/12 AM 4.0 1.8 1.7 1 MODERATE 28/12 PM 3.5 1.3 1.5 1 MINOR 29/01 AM 3.6 1.4 1.4 1 MINOR 29/01 PM 3.4 1.2 1.2 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
